entries.reason: I usually wake up at 7am to start my day, as I live quite far from work.
I usually have breakfast with my partner at 7:45am, typically oatmeal with fruits.

entries.action: Commute by train to West Kensington for work
entries.reason: I usually commute by tube to work, as it is the most convenient and quickest way to get there.
I usually start work at 9:15am, and I like to have a coffee before work.
I usually have lunch with colleagues at a nearby café.

entries.action: Finish work and commute back home
entries.reason: I finish work at 5:30pm and take the tube back home.

entries.action: Go for a run in the park
entries.reason: I like to unwind by going for a run in the park after work.
We usually cook dinner together and enjoy some quality time.
We like to relax by watching a movie at home.
